mapper.select: SELECT p.userNo AS '유저 번호', n.message AS '메세지 내용', r.resNo AS '예약번호', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS invoceDate, p.payment AS '결제수단', n.notiDate, n.notiStatus FROM tb_payinfo p LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_reservation r ON r.payNo = p.payNo LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_notification n ON n.payNo = p.payNo WHERE p.userNo = #{userNo}

SELECT n.message AS '메세지 내용', r.resNo AS '예약번호', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS invoceDate, p.payment AS '결제수단', n.notiDate, n.notiStatus FROM tb_payinfo p LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_reservation r ON r.payNo = p.payNo LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_notification n ON n.payNo = p.payNo WHERE r.resNo = {#resNo};
